thread.title: Laurie

author: Laurie
title: Laurie
text: With groupon I've been able to have experiences I'd never have thought of or done on my own. Paint Nite and Plant Nite were great fun. AAA was helpful a few years ago. Able to give my grandson magazines I wouldn't otherwise have known about. Got some great luggage that stands out in the crowd and is easy to locate because of its pattern and color. Keep on providing great products and experiences. Love Groupon
